snippet: “Betrayal. Sadness. Heartbreak. Numbness. Disbelief.” Despite these feelings, a reader says she will keep fighting to overcome hate and bigotry....
lead_paragraph: “Betrayal. Sadness. Heartbreak. Numbness. Disbelief.” Despite these feelings, a reader says she will keep fighting to overcome hate and bigotry.

headline.print_headline: An American Muslim Woman’s Heartbreak, and Hope
headline.main: An American Muslim Woman’s Heartbreak, and Hope, After the Election
